channel.title: What to bot next?
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/aa7s.png[/img]
Yeah, those are my stats. Obv. I don't really care for em. Currently I'm getting that 90 RC up. (The paint was for lulz). I will get 99 in it eventually. My members runs out on the 23rd. at 16:23 GST Approx (by what they say). And I have a cash stack of only about 6-7m. Members might be bought again later this month for the summer sizzle thing. but until then what is your suggestion on what to bot?

item.title: What to bot next?
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Taharok:

Why are people still botting with an oncoming bot nuke? Jagex has even admitted that they have been tracking almost every account botted by major bots over the last year or two. They may not have banned them all last time, but I wouldn’t feel so safe coming up.

Doubt it tbh. My main has something like 200M+ Xp botted and was botting up until the bot nuke, and still bots now.

They keep pushing it back and back, I doubt a perfect nuke will ever come. Don’t forget-The bots bring money.

Read full topic

item.title: What to bot next?
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

eyeownyew:

How do you have 90 rc and only 6-7m? You should be making a lot more than that with rc

Probably runespan.

Read full topic

item.title: What to bot next?
item.dc:creator: @_Coded ..::Coded::..
item.description:
@_Coded wrote:

Bot what ever you want it’s not accomplishment, and jagex has talked about IP banning ALL botters in the future so good luck

Read full topic

item.title: What to bot next?
item.dc:creator: @JCor9 JCor9
item.description:
@JCor9 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:450559”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=553447.msg4055207#msg4055207 date=1342877821]
Why are people still botting with an oncoming bot nuke? Jagex has even admitted that they have been tracking almost every account botted by major bots over the last year or two. They may not have banned them all last time, but I wouldn’t feel so safe coming up.
[/quote]
They don’t ban members.
How do I know? I had an account that survived all the nukes. It was a member that was a 24/7 botter. Still active today, but not this account.[/quote]

Runescape isnt going to ban members botting. because then they lose 10$. So y ban a bot thats paying them. They only ban the non members and bot nuke is a joke. I created my own bots and i bot right thru their client. So every update they do i already have mine adapted to them. But they only ban F2P not P2P cuz they lose money

Read full topic

Why are people still botting with an oncoming bot nuke? Jagex has even admitted that they have been tracking almost every account botted by major bots over the last year or two. They may not have banned them all last time, but I wouldn’t feel so safe coming up.

They don’t ban members.
How do I know? I had an account that survived all the nukes. It was a member that was a 24/7 botter. Still active today, but not this account.
